## MapToRecordHashMapFactoryType type

Convert `Map<T, U>` to `Record<T, U>` utility.

When we want to convert an ECMAScript2015 Map into a Record hash-map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MapToRecordHashMapFactoryType<
  T = string | number,
  U = string | number
> = (input: Map<T, U>) => Record<T, U>
```
